original_text: Then you must say this, so that the Lord your God hears you: ‘My ancestor was an Aramean who moved from place to place. He went to Egypt to live there as a foreigner. At that time, his family was small. But while he lived in Egypt, his family became a great nation of many powerful people.
korean_text: 너는 또 네 하나님 여호와 앞에 아뢰기를 내 조상은 방랑하는 아람 사람으로서 애굽에 내려가 거기에서 소수로 거류하였더니 거기에서 크고 강하고 번성한 민족이 되었는데

sentences.original_text: so that the Lord your God hears you
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 주 하나님이 당신의 소리를 듣도록

sentences.original_text: who moved from place to place
He went to Egypt to live there
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그곳에서 살기 위해 이집트로 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: But while he lived in Egypt
his family became a great nation
